name: Book of Stones
description:
The end is nigh.

Monsters are at the city gates, and only your alchemy holds them back. With dwindling resources and a whole two days before reinforcements arrive, the situation looks bleak.

As the High Alchemist, you must choose how to defend your city from threats both outside and inside the city walls until reinforcements can break the enemy siege.

What are you willing to sacrifice to protect your city?

Demo 1 features the complete first day of gameplay (around 7k words). Future updates will feature vastly improved art, custom music, and way more story.

Book of Stones began as a NaNoRenO 2017 production, and is in active development - if you want to see what happens next, follow our development blog or tell us what you think about the game in the comments! All feedback is appreciated.
